# DataProviders.AddPath method

Scans a folder and adds any data providers found (i.e. implementing [`IExposedDataProvider`](../../Wokhan.Data.Providers.Contracts/IExposedDataProvider.md)).

```csharp
public static void AddPath(string basePath)
```

| --- | --- |
| basePath | Path to the directory to scan. |
